relationType.description: Ontology value for type of relation with Individual e.g "host", "pathogen", "commensal", etc

individualId.description: Individual identifier (external accession or internal ID).

sex.description: Sex of the individual.Value from NCIT General Qualifier (NCIT:C27993) ontology: UNKNOWN (not assessed or not available) (NCIT:C17998), FEMALE (NCIT:C46113), MALE, (NCIT:C46112) or OTHER SEX (NCIT:C45908).

ethnicity.description: Ethnic background of the individual. Value from NCIT Race ontology (NCIT:C17049), e.g. NCIT:C126531 (Latin American).

geographicOrigin.description: Individual's country or region of origin (birthplace or residence place regardless of ethnic origin). Value from GAZ Geographic Location ontology (GAZ:00000448), e.g. GAZ:00002459 (United States of America).

diseases.description: List of disease(s) been diagnosed to the individual, defined by disease ICD10 code, optionally other disease ontology ID(s), age of onset, stage and the presence of family history.

Age.description: Definition of individual's age at onset, at sample collection time or at diagnosis of disease.

age.description: Value indicating the age of the individual at the time of collection in the ISO8601 duration format `P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S`.

ageGroup.description: Age group value, from NCIT Age Group ontology.

LevelSeverity.description: Level/severity ontology when and as applicable to phenotype observed. Value from TBD, e.g "mild".

DateOfOnset.description: Date of onset/observation of phenotype, in (ISO8601 duration format).

Disease.description: Lisf of disease(s) been diagnosed to the individual, defined by diseaseID, age of onset, stage, level of severity, outcome and the presence of family history.

diseaseId.description: Disease identifier. Value from ICD10 disease codes or ontology terms from disease ontologies such as HPO, OMIM, Orphanet, MONDO, e.g. lactose intolerance (HP:0004789, ICD10CM:E73).

stage.description: Ontology value from Ontology for General Medical Science or Disease Stage Qualifier ontology (NCIT:C28108), e.g. acute onset (OGMS:0000119).

outcome.description: Outcome of passed acute diseases. Value from TBD, eg. "fatal".

familyHistory.description: Boolean indicating determined or self-reported presence of family history of the disease.

Treatment.description: List of treatment(s) been prescribed/administered to individual, defined by treatment ID), date and age of onset, dose, schedule and duration.

treatmentRoute.description: Route of treatment. Value from NCIT Route of Administration ontology.

duration.description: Treatment duration in ISO8601 duration format

Intervention.description: List of intervention(s) been practiced on subject, defined by treatment ID, date and age of onset, dose, schedule and duration.

interventionId.description: Intervention ID. Value from Medical Action Ontology.

date.description: Date of intervention in ISO8601 duration format

modifier.description: Modifier of the intervention. Value from TBD.

Pedigree.description: Pedigree studie(s) in which the individual is part of.

pedigreeDisease.description: (disease code/ontology term object) Disease ID. Value from ICD10 diseasecodes or ontology terms from disease ontologies such as HPO, OMIM, Orphanet, MONDO,e.g. "lactose intolerance" (HP:0004789)

pedigreeRole.description: Pedigree role, defined as relationship to proband. Value from Familymember ontology (NCIT:C41256), e.g. "proband" (NCIT:C64435),"identical twin" (NCIT:C73429), "mother" (NCIT:C25189).

affectedStatus.description: Affected status of Individual in disease of pedigree: "affected" or "unaffected".

PhenotypicFeature.description: List of phenotypic feature(s) observed in the individual, defined by phenotype, age of onset and level/ severity.

phenotypeId.description: Phenotypic feature observed. Value from Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO).

dateOfOnset.description: Date of onset/observation of phenotype, in (ISO8601 duration format)

onsetType.description: Onset type. Value from HPO Onset ontology (HP:0003674), e.g. "congenital onset" (HP:0003577), "adult onset" (HP:0003581).

Measure.description: Measures(s) been taken from Individual, defined by measure ID, date and/or age at measure ment, unit and value.

measureId.description: Measure ID. Value from Clinical Measurement ontology (CMO).

modifier.description: Modifier of the measurement. Value from TBD.

Exposure.description: Exposures(s) occurred to or practiced (lifestyle, behavioural exposures) by Individual,defined by exposureID, date and age of onset, dose, schedule and duration.

exposureID.description: Exposure ID. Value from Environment Exposure Ontology.

modifier.description: Modifier of the exposure. Value from TBD.
